c.mysql: SELECT domainId id, parentId, domainName, domainValue, sort, "others", fullpath FROM a_domain order by fullpath limit 5;
c.sqlit: SELECT domainId id, parentId, domainName, domainValue, sort, "others", fullpath, stamp, upstamp FROM a_domain order by fullpath;
SELECT domainId, domainName, fullpath FROM a_domain d where parentId is null order by d.fullpath
SELECT domainId, domainName, fullpath FROM a_domain d where parentId = 'nation' order by d.fullpath

c.mysql: SELECT funcId, parentId, funcName, funcUrl url, sibling sort, fullpath, css, flags FROM a_sys_functions f order by f.fullpath
c.sqlit: SELECT funcId, parentId, funcName, url, sibling sort, fullpath, css, flags FROM a_functions f order by f.fullpath

c.mysql: select projectId, projectName, parentId, fullpath, sort from p_projects p where p.orgId = '%s'
select roleId as value,roleName as text from a_roles
c.sqlit: select roleId as value,roleName as text from a_roles

c.mysql: select orgId as value, orgName as text from a_reg_org
select departId value, orgId, departName text, departState from a_org_depart where orgId = '%s'
select orgId value, orgName text from a_orgs
c.sqlit: select orgId value, orgName text from a_orgs

c.mysql: select r.roleId is not null checked, funcName text, f.funcId, parentId,f.sibling sort, fullpath from a_sys_functions f left outer join a_role_funcs r on r.funcId = f.funcId and r.roleId = '%s' order by fullpath
c.sqlit: select r.roleId is not null checked, funcName text, f.funcId, parentId,f.sibling sort, fullpath from a_functions f left outer join a_role_func r on r.funcId = f.funcId and r.roleId = '%s' order by fullpath
SELECT 0 checked, indId, indName, parent parentId, sort, fullpath, css, weight, qtype, remarks, extra FROM indicators order by fullpath
select p.label || ': ' || sum(val) legend, max(v.val) max, min(v.val) min from vector v join s_domain d on v.dim3 = d.did join s_domain p on d.parent = p.did group by p.did order by p.label
select count(vid) cnt, d.did, d.label indust, p.label cate from vector v join s_domain d on v.dim3 = d.did join s_domain p on d.parent = p.did group by d.did order by p.did, d.did;
select count(vid) cnt, d.did, d.label indust, p.label cate from vector v join s_domain d on v.dim7 = d.did join s_domain p on d.parent = p.did group by d.did order by p.did, d.did;
select %1$s as x, %2$s as z, val amount from vector v join s_domain x on v.dim3 = x.did join s_domain z on v.dim7 = z.did group by dim1, dim3, dim7 order by x.did asc, z.did asc

c.mysql: select domainId as value, domainName as name from a_domain d where d.parentId = 'curr-cate'
select domainId as value, domainName as name from a_domain d where d.parentId = 'curr-subj'
select domainId as value, domainName as name from a_domain d where d.parentId = 'curr-module'
select domainId as value, domainName as name from a_domain d where d.parentId = 'curr-level'
